name: Platform Builder Pro 5.3
description:
If you would like to download the free version instead, visit https://tingthing.itch.io/platform-builder-free.

Platform Builder is a project designed to allow its users to create their own platform games without the need for programming skills. The program is designed to be user-friendly, and quick to learn, yet powerful and sophisticated to allow maximum creativity. You are in command to design your own character, levels, over-worlds, enemies, title screen, and more. The program also has a built in assistant which tells you useful information as you go, and contains knowledge for almost any element in the Builder.

Games and levels can be shared and played straight from Platform Builder, giving you the opportunity to publish your creations and check out what other people have done.

You are viewing the page for Platform Builder Pro. This version is everything Platform Builder has to offer. You get everything from the free version plus:

-Unlimited Overworlds
-Unlimited Courses
-Unlimited Custom Enemies
-Unlimited Custom Items
-Unlimited Custom Projectiles
(Basically Unlimited everything!)

Platform Builder Pro also allows you to upload many of your own backgrounds, tilesets, music, and many sprites such as your character, enemies, items, etc. You are also able to import sandbox levels into your games, customize the some of character's physics, and yes, you get free updates!
